ul.li: Java Runtime Environment (JRE) 1.6 or 1.7 (for the quiz system);

conbody.p: .NET Framework 3.5 and JRE are included in Dialog Nibelung installation package.

Windows Media Player 10 is included in Windows Vista/7/8. For earlier versions (Windows XP and Windows Server 2003) it can be installed from the Dialog Nibelung CD. Some antivirus software may interfere with certain functions of Dialog Nibelung (e.g. file transfer). If this is the case, this antivirus software will have to be properly set up or even disabled.
